economic_survey_data.description: Key/value pairs representing the filled out 'Socio Economics' survey

indicator_survey_data.description: Key/value pairs representing the filled out 'Indicators' survey

user_created.description: the id of the user that created this definition

required.description: List of properties are required to be filled

ui:group:indicators.description: Specifies which fields should be grouped as indicators in the UI

ui:order.description: Specifies the order in which the fields should be rendererd in the UI

Property.description: Holds info representing the definition of the field

survey_ui_schema.description: The UI SCHEMA definition of the survey, to be used on render
